properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) NOTICELISTCOUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT ROWNUM , NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TYPE , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_DATE FROM NOTICE N WHERE N.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND ROWNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FAQLISTCOUNT FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT ROWNUM , FAQ_TYPE , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT FROM FAQ F WHERE F.FAQ_STATUS = 'Y' AND ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC
